definition: to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: He says he expects to be drowned in laughter.
sentences.chinese: 他表示已料想到會被笑死。

sentences.english: Assume it will take far longer than any other project you've previously done.
sentences.chinese: 要料想到它可能比你以往的其他項目更耗時間。

sentences.english: Angle at any time as fish are often swimming at the place out of your expectation.
sentences.chinese: 要隨時撒下魚鉤，魚兒常在你最料想不到的地方遊動。

sentences.english: Although the weather had been stormy all night, the crew did not expect serious problems.
sentences.chinese: 儘管整晚風雨不斷，船員們並沒有料想到任何大問題。

sentences.english: Such a virtuous Shen Guanghui Sun Weidong is unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 這樣賢惠的沈光蕙是孫維棟料想不到的。

sentences.english: I didn't expect him to turn a deaf ear to his comrades' criticism.
sentences.chinese: 我沒料想到他對同志們的批評竟充耳不聞。

sentences.english: He expected that the experiment would be a success.
sentences.chinese: 他料想那試驗一定會成功。

sentences.english: Seen in this light, the matter is not as serious as people generally suppose.
sentences.chinese: 從這個角度看，問題並不像人們一般料想的那樣嚴重。

sentences.english: I couldn't imagine his saying so.
sentences.chinese: 我料想不到他會這樣說。

sentences.english: It's their unintended consequences that make me cringe.
sentences.chinese: 是它們未被料想到的後果令我往後退縮。

sentences.english: Some scruples and some reluctance the widower-father may be supposed to have felt;
sentences.chinese: 可以料想，那喪偶的父親心裏有些顧慮，有些躊躇。

sentences.english: neither he nor i anticipated this long and difficult road.
sentences.chinese: 他和我誰都料想不到這條路是那麼崎嶇漫長。

sentences.english: I’m pretty good at making excuses – and I expect you are too.
sentences.chinese: 我最善於找藉口了，料想你也是如此。

sentences.english: Now what you said is what I detected.
sentences.chinese: 如今你所說的正是我所料想到的。

sentences.english: To his surprise, when these people saw him, they stalked off laughing.
sentences.chinese: 不料想，那幾個人看見他，一陣大笑之後揚長而去。

sentences.english: It happened just when we least expected it.
sentences.chinese: 事情發生在我們最料想不到的時候。

definition: hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
